original_title: Germany’s Merz facing opposition over Ukraine troop plan – Bild — RT World News
article_summary: US abstains from condemning Russia for the 2008 war with Georgia at the UN, breaking past practices. The Georgian PM blames the previous regime for the conflict, while the current government is criticized for strained relations with the US. Meanwhile, Israel launches an operation to take over Gaza City, aiming for full control, with no immediate response from Hamas to a ceasefire proposal.</s>
